short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides YouTube's popups for YouTube TV and Premium. Does not block ads in videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is NOT an ad blocker. It only blocks the popups for YouTube TV and YouTube Premium that sometimes show up in the lower left corner of the screen.
